name: Digital Adventurer
description:
Welcome to your digital character sheet, Adventurers! Built for fifth edition, Digital Adventurer is a multi-page character sheet app that keeps track of your character stats, abilities, inventory, and more in an organized way.

With Digital Adventurer, you can:
- Create, save, and edit multiple characters using your favorite races and classes.
- Automatically calculate your ability modifiers, armor class, skill bonuses, and more
- Easily track your actions, bonus actions, reactions and all of their details
- Add to and edit your inventory with base items and your own custom items
- Fill your spellbook with 5e spells, check your spell attack bonuses and spell save DC
- Track and edit your hit points, temp hp, and damage taken

If you're tired of fumbling around with paper or waiting for slow online character sheets to load, Digital Adventurer has you covered.
